invalid_email: The e-mail address is not valid.
forbidden: You are not allowed to perform this action.
not_uppercase: Only latin uppercase letters are allowed
not_uppercase_or_number: Only uppercase and numbers are allowed
account_not_found: The "Credit to" account does not exist or deposits are not allowed.

user_invalid_status: The “Credit to” user has invalid status.
uncovered_transfer_fee: Transfer fee amount is greater than requested transfer amount.
withdrawal_not_allowed: It is not allowed to perform withdrawals from this account.
deposit_not_allowed: The "Credit to" account does not exist or deposits are not allowed.
insufficient_funds: Not enough available funds in the account.
duplicate_transfer_fee: Transfer fee with the same name and request subject is already exist.
account_type_contains_accounts: This account type is used in an account
zero_amount: Amount is equals or less than zero
invalid_account_owner: The "Credit to" account does not exist or deposits are not allowed
card_type_associated_with_cards: This card type is used in a card
limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the limits. Please upgrade the KYC level or contact the administrator.
admin_group_constraint: This class is used in administrator profile
confirmation_code_is_invalid: The one-time login link is no longer valid. Please try to reset your password.
reset_password_is_not_allowed: This action cannot be performed. Please, contact the site administrator.
action_cannot_be_performed: This action cannot be performed. Please, contact the site administrator.
unauthorized: Sorry, unrecognized email/password or password. Have you forgotten your password?
cannot_find_user_by_email: Sorry, we are not recognized a username or an e-mail address.
cannot_delete_user_group: It is not possible to remove user group. User group has one or more linked profile.
user_group_already_exists: User group with provided name already exists.
group_name_duplication: Class with the same name already exists.
access_token_invalid: Your access session has expired. Please log in once again to continue the work.
bad_collection_params: Params for collections are not valid.
invalid_exchange_rate: Sorry, no exchange rate currently available for this currency. Please contact support.
empty_feed: The main currency does not have a link to a provider.
used_currency: {{currency}} currency is used in an account or card. Deactivating used currency is impossible.
cannot_set_inactive_currency_as_main: Main currency can not be not active
bad_test_smtp_params: Test email failed - Please check SMTP settings
required_empty: Value is required and cannot be empty.
decimal_not_valid: Maximum integers and/or decimals exceeded. Allowed format {{value}}
min_age: Minimum age requirements not met. Please revise date of birth.
usernamevalidator: Spaces are allowed; punctuation is not allowed except for periods, hyphens, apostrophes and underscores.
confirm_email_invalid: Email addresses provided do not match.
signature_invalid: Invalid signature value. Signature must contain 8 numeric characters. No alpha characters, no spaces and no special characters allowed.
notempty: This field must not be empty.
emptysummernote: This field must not be empty.
serverportpattern: Should be valid port number from range 1 to 65535.
minlessthanmax: Max should be more than Min
tan_standard_less_limit: Should be less than Standard TANs Qty
special_character_required: At least one special character is required: ^ $ * . [ ] { } ( ) ? - + " ! @ # % & / \ , > < ' : ; | _ ~ '.
number_required: At least one number is required.
uppercase_letter_required: At least one uppercase letter is required.
lowercase_letter_required: At least one lowercase letter is required.
not_enough_space_in_files_storage: Not enough space in the file storage
cannot_save_logo_area: Selected logo area must be a minimum of 20px high by 20px wide.
date_more_than_max_date: Date must be less or equal to {{value}}
pecunia_phone_number: Phone number must start with 6 or 7 and contain 9 digits.
pecunia_card_not_balance: Transfer cannot be performed. Not enough funds.
recipient_card_is_blocked: Transfer cannot be processed: Recipient card has blocked status.
fail_receive_external_transactions: Request could not be processed [PEC003]. Please contact the administrator.
external_card_exist: User already has card for this card provider.
temp_auth_token_not_found: Temp auth token is required but it's empty or not found
temp_auth_token_invalid: Time's up. Please log in and try again
external_account_not_found: Account not found. Please try again
card_provider_api_token_invalid: Service currently unavailable [PEC002]. Please contact administrator.
card_provider_server_error: Service currently unavailable [PEC001]. Please try again later.
cannot_create_user_with_registration_req: Cannot create user with registration request.
